trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) is passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xx x xxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for this exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx $$xxxxxx$Xxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx Xxxxxx Xxxxx$ xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the parameter that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.
